other_tests.findings: Impaired TSH response to TRH; low basal TSH levels; normal prolactin response.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 8 years old, showed impaired TSH response in two immunoassays; serum TSH immunoreactivity was undetectable in two methods.
Normalization of pituitary size noted during follow-up.

other_tests.findings: Completely normalized pituitary size at 21 months.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Complete normalization of pituitary size compared to initial MRI findings.
Hearing function was normalized noted at age 7.
